fullText: The new Broadway musical 'Lempicka' is a gorgeous mess — emphasis on gorgeous. The show about Polish Art Deco painter Tamara de Lempicka is stuffed with stunning visuals but lacks a compelling story.
dtliExcerpt: The new Broadway musical 'Lempicka' is a gorgeous mess — emphasis on gorgeous. The show about Polish Art Deco painter Tamara de Lempicka is stuffed with stunning visuals but lacks a compelling story.
